title: Saradomin godsword (or)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Saradomin godsword (or) is a Saradomin godsword with a Saradomin godsword ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the godsword. It costs 28,109,652 for both the parts to make the Saradomin godsword (or).

Item ID20372

The Saradomin godsword (or) is a Saradomin godsword with a Saradomin godsword ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the godsword. It costs 28,109,652 for both the parts to make the Saradomin godsword (or).

While the godsword is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable godsword and ornament kit.
